info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 5:03PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Jackson and southwestern Klamath Counties through 545 PM PDT... At 502 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Summit Snowpark, or 25 miles northeast of Ashland, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Great Meadow Snow Park, Fish Lake Snow Park, Howard Prairie, Pederson Snow Park, Fourmile Lake Campground, Mount Mcloughlin Trailhead, Summit Snowpark, Fish Lake, Highway 140 Near Lake Of The Woods and Howard Prairie Recreation Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
